Nepali Basic Change History
====================

1.1.1 (2020-10-28)
----------------
* Increment version number to force recompile of touch layout.

1.1 (2019-09-17)
----------------
* Keyman keyboard generated by ImportKeyboard from Windows 10 
* New mobile layout

1.0 (2009-05-15)
----------------------
* Initial Desktop import from Windows Vista
